author: alexsr-98
body:
#### PR description:

- This PR adds a HLTfilter (HLTMuonL3orL2PreFilter.cc) designed to filter L2 or L3 muons. If the L3 exists it is saved together with all the L2 muons which did not match with any L3. 
- There is the possibility to cut on different variables: some of them common for the L2 and L3, and others specific for each type muon. 
- This development has been presented in several Muon POG meetings: [presentation](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1096479/#3-status-of-global-displaced-m).

#### PR validation:

- Passed the "scram b runtests" test.
title: Added new HLTfilter to select L3 or L2 muons
